text: hananimkkeseo geudaeleul geudeul ga unde han muliege gage hani geu deul-eun geudaelobuteo chuljeonsikyeo jula heolag-eul guhayeossdeola illeogalodoe neohuineun gyeolko nawa hamkke chuljeonhal sueobs-eul geos-imyeo neohuineun ttohan nawa hamkke eotteon jeog-egedo seongjeonhaji mosha lila neohuineun cheoeum-e nam-a iss-eul geos-eul gippeohaess-euni bandaehaneun jadeulgwanam-a iss-eula
